1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2016, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing Personal Eventing Protocol features
    4: %%%      as described in XEP-0163
    5: %%% @end
    6: %%%===================================================================
    7: 
    8: -module(pep_SUITE).
    9: -compile(export_all).
   10: 
   11: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   13: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   14: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   15: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   16: 
   17: 
   18: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   19: %% Suite configuration
   20: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: 
   22: all() -> [
   23:           {group, pep_tests}
   24:          ].
   25: 
   26: groups() -> [
   27:              {pep_tests, [sequence],
   28:               [
   29:                pep_caps_test,
   30:                publish_test,
   31:                notify_test,
   32:                send_caps_after_login_test
   33:               ]
   34:              }
   35:             ].
   36: 
   37: suite() ->
   38:     escalus:suite().
   39: 
   40: -define(CAPS_HASH, <<"+XtEyyuYqe1dzskS+JMkYABKv2U=">>).
   41: -define(CAPS_NODE_NAME, <<"http://www.chatopus.com">>).
   42: -define(CAPS_NODE, {?CAPS_NODE_NAME, ?CAPS_HASH}).
   43: 
   44: -define(DOMAIN, <<"localhost">>).
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Init & teardown
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: 
   50: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   51:     escalus:init_per_suite(dynamic_modules:save_modules(?DOMAIN, Config)).
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   54:     dynamic_modules:restore_modules(?DOMAIN, Config),
   55:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   56: 
   57: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     dynamic_modules:ensure_modules(?DOMAIN, required_modules()),
   59:     Users = escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob]),
   60:     escalus:create_users(Config, Users),
   61:     escalus_story:make_everyone_friends(Config, Users).
   62: 
   63: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   64:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob])),
   65:     ok.
   66: 
   67: init_per_testcase(pep_caps_test, Config) ->
   68:     mongoose_helper:clear_caps_cache(?CAPS_NODE),
   69:     escalus:init_per_testcase(pep_caps_test, Config);
   70: init_per_testcase(TestName, Config) ->
   71:     escalus:init_per_testcase(TestName, Config).
   72: 
   73: end_per_testcase(TestName, Config) ->
   74:     escalus:end_per_testcase(TestName, Config).
   75: 
   76: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   77: %% Test cases for XEP-0163
   78: %% Comments in test cases refer to sections is the XEP
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: 
   81: %% Group: pep_tests (sequence)
   82: 
   83: pep_caps_test(Config) ->
   84:     escalus:story(
   85:       Config,
   86:       [{bob,1}],
   87:       fun(Bob) ->
   88:               %% Send presence with capabilities (chap. 1 ex. 4)
   89:               %% Server does not know the version string, so it requests feature list
   90:               DiscoRequest = send_presence_with_caps(Bob, caps(), true),
   91: 
   92:               %% Client responds with a list of supported features (chap. 1 ex. 5)
   93:               send_caps_disco_result(Bob, DiscoRequest)
   94:       end).
   95: 
   96: publish_test(Config) ->
   97:     escalus:story(
   98:       Config,
   99:       [{alice,1}],
  100:       fun(Alice) ->
  101:               %% Account owner publishes item (chap. 3, ex. 6)
  102:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item1">>, {pep, ?NS_USER_TUNE}, [])
  103:       end).
  104: 
  105: notify_test(Config) ->
  106:     escalus:story(
  107:       [{escalus_overrides, [{initial_activity, {?MODULE, send_initial_presence_with_caps}}]} | Config],
  108:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  109:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  110:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(
  111:                 Bob, <<"item1">>, {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Alice), ?NS_USER_TUNE}, []),
  112: 
  113:               pubsub_tools:publish(Alice, <<"item2">>, {pep, ?NS_USER_TUNE}, []),
  114:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(
  115:                 Bob, <<"item2">>, {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Alice), ?NS_USER_TUNE}, [])
  116:       end).
  117: 
  118: send_caps_after_login_test(Config) ->
  119:     escalus:story(
  120:       Config,
  121:       [{alice,1}, {bob,1}],
  122:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  123:               Caps = caps(),
  124:               send_presence_with_caps(Bob, Caps, false),
  125:               receive_presence_with_caps(Alice, Bob, Caps),
  126: 
  127:               pubsub_tools:receive_item_notification(
  128:                 Bob, <<"item2">>, {escalus_utils:get_short_jid(Alice), ?NS_USER_TUNE}, [])
  129:       end).
  130: 
  131: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  132: %% Helpers
  133: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  134: 
  135: required_modules() ->
  136:     [{mod_caps, []},
  137:      {mod_pubsub, [
  138:                    {plugins,[<<"dag">>,<<"pep">>]},
  139:                    {nodetree,<<"dag">>},
  140:                    {pep_mapping,[]}
  141:                   ]}].
  142: 
  143: send_initial_presence_with_caps(User) ->
  144:     case string:to_lower(binary_to_list(escalus_client:username(User))) of
  145:         "alice" -> escalus_story:send_initial_presence(User);
  146:         "bob" -> do_send_presence_with_caps(User, caps())
  147:     end.
  148: 
  149: send_presence_with_caps(User, Caps, ExpectDiscoRequest) ->
  150:     do_send_presence_with_caps(User, Caps),
  151:     DiscoRequest = case ExpectDiscoRequest of
  152:                        true -> escalus:wait_for_stanza(User);
  153:                        false -> undefined
  154:                    end,
  155:     receive_presence_with_caps(User, User, Caps),
  156:     DiscoRequest.
  157: 
  158: do_send_presence_with_caps(User, Caps) ->
  159:     Presence = escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Caps]),
  160:     escalus:send(User, Presence).
  161: 
  162: send_caps_disco_result(User, DiscoRequest) ->
  163:     QueryEl = escalus_stanza:query_el(?NS_DISCO_INFO, feature_elems()),
  164:     DiscoResult = escalus_stanza:iq_result(DiscoRequest, [QueryEl]),
  165:     escalus:send(User, DiscoResult).
  166: 
  167: subscribe_presence(User1, User2) ->
  168:     SubscribeIq = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User2), <<"subscribe">>),
  169:     escalus:send(User1, SubscribeIq),
  170: 
  171:     _Received = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User2),
  172: 
  173:     _ReceivedUser1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User1),
  174: 
  175:     SubscribedIq = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User1), <<"subscribed">>),
  176:     escalus:send(User2, SubscribedIq),
  177: 
  178:     _Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(User1, 3),
  179: 
  180:     _SubscribedIq2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User2).
  181: 
  182: request_subscription(User1, User2) ->
  183:     Jid2 = escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User2),
  184:     Subscribe = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(Jid2, <<"subscribe">>),
  185:     escalus:send(User1, Subscribe),
  186: 
  187:     escalus:assert(is_roster_set, escalus:wait_for_stanza(User1)),
  188: 
  189:     SubscribeNotification = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User2),
  190:     escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribe">>], SubscribeNotification).
  191: 
  192: accept_subscription(User1, User2) ->
  193:     Jid1 = escalus_utils:get_short_jid(User1),
  194:     Subscribed = escalus_stanza:presence_direct(Jid1, <<"subscribed">>),
  195:     escalus:send(User2, Subscribed),
  196: 
  197:     escalus:assert(is_roster_set, escalus:wait_for_stanza(User2)),
  198:     escalus:assert(is_roster_set, escalus:wait_for_stanza(User1)),
  199: 
  200:     SubscribedNotification = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User1),
  201:     escalus:assert(is_presence_with_type, [<<"subscribed">>], SubscribedNotification).
  202: 
  203: receive_presence_with_caps(User1, User2, Caps) ->
  204:     PresenceNotification = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User1),
  205:     escalus:assert(is_presence, PresenceNotification),
  206:     escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [User2], PresenceNotification),
  207:     Caps = exml_query:subelement(PresenceNotification, <<"c">>).
  208: 
  209: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  210: %% XML helpers
  211: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  212: 
  213: feature_elems() ->
  214:     [#xmlel{name = <<"identity">>,
  215:             attrs = [{<<"category">>, <<"client">>},
  216:                      {<<"name">>, <<"Psi">>},
  217:                      {<<"type">>, <<"pc">>}]} |
  218:      [feature_elem(F) || F <- features()]].
  219: 
  220: feature_elem(F) ->
  221:     #xmlel{name = <<"feature">>,
  222:            attrs = [{<<"var">>, F}]}.
  223: 
  224: caps() ->
  225:     #xmlel{name = <<"c">>,
  226:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ?NS_CAPS},
  227:                     {<<"hash">>, <<"sha-1">>},
  228:                     {<<"node">>, ?CAPS_NODE_NAME},
  229:                     {<<"ver">>, ?CAPS_HASH}]}.
  230: 
  231: features() ->
  232:     [?NS_DISCO_INFO,
  233:      ?NS_DISCO_ITEMS,
  234:      ?NS_GEOLOC,
  235:      ns_notify(?NS_GEOLOC),
  236:      ?NS_USER_TUNE,
  237:      ns_notify(?NS_USER_TUNE)].
  238: 
  239: ns_notify(NS) ->
  240:     <<NS/binary, "+notify">>.
